                              # 5. Javaå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼ˆJedisï¼‰

                              • Jedisï¼šä¸€æ¬¾javaæ“ä½œredisæ•°æ®åº“çš„å·¥å…·
                              • ä½¿ç”¨æ­¥éª¤ï¼š
                                • ä¸‹è½½jedisçš„jaråŒ…

                              <!-- jedis -->
<dependency>
    <groupId>redis.clients</groupId>
    <artifactId>jedis</artifactId>
    <version>3.8.0</version>
</dependency>

                              public class JedisTest {

    private Jedis jedis;

    @BeforeEach
    void setUp() {
        // 1. å»ºç«‹è¿æ¥
        jedis = new Jedis("192.168.200.130",6379);
        // 2. è®¾ç½®å¯†ç 
        jedis.auth("123456");
        // 3. é€‰æ‹©åº“
        jedis.select(0);
    }

    @Test
    void testString() {
        // å­˜å…¥æ•°æ®
        String result = jedis.set("name", "å“ˆå“ˆ");
        System.out.println("result=" + result);
        // è·å–æ•°æ®
        String name = jedis.get("name");
        System.out.println("name=" + name);
    }

    @Test
    void testHash() {
        // æ’å…¥hashæ•°æ®
        jedis.hset("user:1","name","Mick");
        jedis.hset("user:1","age","21");

        // è·å–
        Map<String, String> map = jedis.hgetAll("user:1");
        System.out.println(map);
    }

    @AfterEach
    void tearDown() {
        if (jedis != null) {
            jedis.close();
        }
    }
}

                              jedisè¿æ¥æ± ï¼šJedisPool

                              • ä½¿ç”¨ï¼š

                                1. åˆ›å»ºJedisPoolè¿æ¥æ± å¯¹è±¡

                                  public class JedisConnectionFactory {
    private static final JedisPool jedisPool;

    static {
        // é…ç½®è¿æ¥æ± 
        JedisPoolConfig poolConfig = new JedisPoolConfig();
        poolConfig.setMaxTotal(8);
        poolConfig.setMaxIdle(8);
        poolConfig.setMinIdle(0);
        poolConfig.setMaxWaitMillis(1000);
        // åˆ›å»ºè¿æ¥æ± å¯¹è±¡
        jedisPool = new JedisPool(poolConfig,
                    "192.168.200.130", 6379, 1000, "123456");

    }

    public static Jedis getJedis() {
        return jedisPool.getResource();
    }

}

                                2. è°ƒç”¨æ–¹æ³•è·å–Jedisè¿æ¥

                                  public class JedisTest {

    private Jedis jedis;

    @BeforeEach
    void setUp() {
        // 1. å»ºç«‹è¿æ¥
        jedis = JedisConnectionFactory.getJedis();
        // 2. è®¾ç½®å¯†ç 
        jedis.auth("123456");
        // 3. é€‰æ‹©åº“
        jedis.select(0);
    }

    @Test
    void testString() {
        // å­˜å…¥æ•°æ®
        String result = jedis.set("name", "å“ˆå“ˆ");
        System.out.println("result=" + result);
        // è·å–æ•°æ®
        String name = jedis.get("name");
        System.out.println("name=" + name);
    }

    @Test
    void testHash() {
        // æ’å…¥hashæ•°æ®
        jedis.hset("user:1","name","Mick");
        jedis.hset("user:1","age","21");

        // è·å–
        Map<String, String> map = jedis.hgetAll("user:1");
        System.out.println(map);
    }

    @AfterEach
    void tearDown() {
        if (jedis != null) {
            jedis.close();
        }
    }
}
